author: Katherine Clarke
title: Late Designer Vince Camutoâ€™s Hamptons Estate Fetches $49 Million
text:
A Hamptons estate that was seeking $100 million in 2008 has sold for about half of its original asking price.
The Water Mill, N.Y. property, which closed for roughly $49 million, according to people familiar with the deal, has a long listing history. It has been on and off the market several times, including for $49.5 million in 2013 and for $67 million in 2015.
